website_summaries.verdict: Two leading names, HJC and Sena, combine to produce a high-spec helmet with great Bluetooth integration.
pros: Tough polycarbonate helmet with excellent ventilation
Anti-fog main visor plus internal sun shield
Call answering and turn-by-turn GPS functions
cons: Model 20B has up to eight but costs significantly more

customer_reviews.title: Best in price category modular deal
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvements all around over the IS Maxx2 which I found to be uncomfortable on all day rides. This is just better all around, ventilation improved, less prone to fogging, sun visor is more adjustable and not clunky. The chin skirt comes included instead of extra, needed for those who want an extended riding season. Now this package came with the Sena smart 10B INSTALLED. Now I've looked all over and couldn't find these 2 separate items for less. Here they do the hardest part for you and install it into the helmet so all you have to do is charge it, pair it to your phone, and ride. Couldn't ask for anything better in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The issues.
customer_reviews.text: So im giving this a pretty low review based on a few issues. First was the place I ordered from. The helmet shop. Sent the wrong helmet to me then when I ttied to get it fixed they called me a liar and a thief. Finally returned it and took forever to get my money back. As for the helmet itself, its not bad but the left side where the helmet hinges upward came apart during a ride. There are 3 screws that must have rattled loose so I recomend checking them before taking it for a ride. Otherwise the Bluetooth is nice and the built in tinted visor is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Luke St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Really comfortable. Speakers for the Bluetooth work great when listening to music. Nice and clear on the highway.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Overall
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is worth the money. bluetooth works perfectly. the headset has great sound quality and clarity. the microphone works perfectly. everyone I talk to hears me clearly. The face shield is smooth and so is the sunshield. On all 3 features the helmet has, each position needs a little force but they all lock into position. The air flow is good but I personally would like a little more air coming in. I would rate that, between 1-5, a 3.5
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight... Get 1 size bigger than what is recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mitch bywater

customer_reviews.title: I would buy one again...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great helmet for the money. It is very light and quiet. My only reason for the 4 instead of 5 star rating is that the face shield will only stay in the full open or closed position..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for long rides
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable helmet. About one size up based on others review, and it fit fit perfectly. The headset comes installed, and it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen G Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, has good crash ratings and has the Sena 10B pre-installed all for a great price. Is definitely a snug fit and can get a little uncomfortable, but when you're doing 120+mph it's not on your mind. Fantastic package for it's range.
customer_reviews.author: Byrd

customer_reviews.title: F$&@ Yeah!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money! Great helmet all around. Feels and looks like a top line model for 1/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Fits small.
customer_reviews.text: Order at least one size larger, perhaps two. Road noise competes with volume above 55 mph.
customer_reviews.author: richard nelson

customer_reviews.title: HJC i90 Helmet with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! good price. Bluetooth works great. Remember to go one size bigger. Very comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: Clear comms
customer_reviews.text: Like!! Fits tight around the chin. Size does run a little small
